summary: Diff implements several requested technical SEO/perf items (lazy-loaded sections, React Query caching tweaks, robots/sitemap, SEO meta tags, JSON-LD component, validation checklist). However, it also introduces multiple visible UI/copy/style changes (violating the pixel-identical constraint), adds backend logic changes, and the JSON-LD and image-modern-format requirements appear only partially met.

missing_requirements.requirement: Enforce pixel-identical UI by limiting changes to non-visual technical optimizations only; no user-facing strings changed.
missing_requirements.reason: Diff shows multiple visible text/content and styling/asset changes in UI components and broad UI redesign indicated in summaries, which violates the pixel-identical/no-copy-change constraint rather than enforcing it.

missing_requirements.requirement: Serve modern image formats (WebP/AVIF) via <picture> where possible while preserving identical visuals and dimensions.
missing_requirements.reason: Diff adds width/height, loading, decoding attributes, but no evidence of <picture> usage or WebP/AVIF sources for existing images.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add ItemList JSON-LD representing the tools list with at minimum name + url for each item, derived from the same tool data used on the page.
missing_requirements.reason: SeoJsonLd ItemList uses SoftwareApplication entries with name/description/category and optional offers/ratings, but shows no per-item URL field (e.g., tool.website) in the JSON-LD output.

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide a technical-only validation checklist including recorded Lighthouse Performance and SEO scores and confirmation of pixel-identical UI.
missing_requirements.reason: Checklist file exists and lists targets/expected improvements, but the diff does not show actual recorded Lighthouse scores (numbers/results) being captured.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend actor behavior changes (new validations/traps, tool map logic changes, query implementations) despite request being frontend-only technical SEO/perf changes and no new backend services.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request backend logic changes; backend was to remain a single Motoko actor, but requirements focus on landing page frontend SEO/perf and constraints include 'No new backend services' (not 'change backend logic').

hallucinated_features.description: New/changed user-facing landing page copy and UI elements inside tool cards (e.g., bonus perks line, deal banner, 'Pro version free' banner, emoji-prefixed text).
hallucinated_features.reason: Explicitly disallowed by REQ-1 and non-goals (no visible copy/CTA changes or new visible UI elements).

hallucinated_features.description: Visible content/copy changes in below-the-fold sections (e.g., TrustSection headline, WhyUseSection feature titles/descriptions) and asset path changes to generated images.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; violates pixel-identical constraint and 'no copy changes'.

hallucinated_features.description: Large-scale restyling/redesign across multiple components (hero/header/search/category filters/footer/modal/top banner) as described in the file summary.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested and violates pixel-identical constraint; indicates changes to layout/styling/components beyond technical-only optimizations.

hallucinated_features.description: Meta title/description content that appears to introduce new marketing copy/keywords (e.g., 'Free AI Tools & Pro Trials - Unlock Premium AI Deals & Coupons' and mentions of specific tools).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-7 requires using existing on-page messaging with no invented marketing copy; diff provides new phrasing and specific tool mentions without evidence they exist on-page.
Not requested in requirements; also introduces an external domain hint even though no change was requested here.
